title: Air France-KLM: 2.5x EV/EBITDA Looks Cheap, But Risks Remain (Rating Upgrade) (AFRAF)
desc: Air France-KLM's 2026 guidance targets 3-5% capacity growth, 2% unit cost increase, €3B CapEx, and leverage of 1.5-2x. Read why AFRAF stock is upgraded to buy.

title: Does Abortion Cause Infertility? Doctors Explain
desc: OB-GYNs say abortion does not cause infertility, cancer, or long-term psychological trauma when performed safely under medical supervision. Experts stress that early, legal, and guided care is highly safe, while risks arise mainly from misinformation, stigma, delayed treatment, or unverified pills. Most women report relief after informed decisions. , Health, Times Now

title: Woman handed gift card receipt for £63 quadrillion
desc: She thought it was "hilarious" when she saw her remaining gift card balance from a matcha latte.

title: Afrobeats, Billboard and Barometers of Success in African Music
desc: The Billboard article is only a symptom of a deeper, more insidious problem..

title: Return to 50:50 police recruitment a mistake - DUP
desc: Any return to 50:50 recruitment to the police force in Northern Ireland would be a "mistake", DUP leader Gavin Robinson has said.

title: TB outbreak: Mask up at crowded places like Ramadan bazaars, public urged
desc: KUALA LUMPUR: As Malaysians flock to Ramadan bazaars and breaking fast gatherings, the Health Ministry is reminding the public to observe tuberculosis (TB) precautions, especially in crowded and enclosed spaces.

title: James Webb Space Telescope captures strange magnetic forces warping Uranus
desc: For the first time, scientists have mapped Uranus’s upper atmosphere in three dimensions, tracking temperatures and charged particles up to 5,000 kilometers above the clouds. Webb’s sharp vision revealed glowing auroral bands and unexpected dark regions shaped by the planet’s wildly tilted magnetic field.

title: Chief announces his resignation
desc: Giancarlo Italiano has stood down as men’s head coach following the 5-0 derby defeat to Auckland FC.
